title: Find location to override PC by stack frame with stackoverflow
content:
I have stackoverflow in MIPS arch (without ASLR/canary) In Ida I see that the buffer that has the overflow located in SP+200 In the beginning if function I can see the stack size because I see the command 
addiu $sp, -4000
So I guess the stack frame on this function is 4000 If I want to override the PC register (when the function is return) , should I need to write to buffer 4000 (stack frame) -200(location of buffer in stack) ? Because the address is decrement is stack?
